Cranes

A REPUTABLE & RELIABLE CRANES MANUFACTURING COMPANY

Globally, the construction industry is one of the fastest-growing sectors today. We, at Indo Farm, create robust and easy-to-handle hydraulic pick and carry cranes that comply with high standards of strength, safety, and operability to assist you to gain a competitive edge in the market.

Built for toughness, and designed by our dedicated in-house team, our machineries are smooth to operate, with a comfortable driver’s cabin and full control at all times ensuring the safety or on-road travel and in-field reliability. We design, build, and service all types of mobile cranes which make your construction tasks far easier and risk-free.

An advanced crane that provides a maximum load capacity of 15T and is  powered by BS-IV 101 HP engine. With 4 side visibility, high torque engine and the shortest turning radius, this crane gives the best stability. Low maintenance, less fuel consumption, 4 wheel drive along with a well articulated hydraulic power steering ensures stability.

With a load capacity of 15T, with a maximum operating capacity of 12630 KG. This crane has a four cylinder, water cooled diesel engine with a 60 HP engine, this crane has  a boom height of 19.2 m with a horizontal reach of 16.6 m. It has a heavy duty transmission for crane application, sliding mesh spur teeth gearbox, 8 forward and 2 reverse speeds with high and low selector and articulated power steering that is hydraulically controlled through two double acting hydraulic rams.

[/dsm_card][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][dsm_card button_css=”prod-grn-btn” title=”INDO POWER 17 FNX” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/crane6.png” image_as_background=”off” image_alignment=”center” badge_background_color=”#535353″ content_padding=”20px||20px||false|false” button_text=”Know More” button_url=”/equipment/indo-power-16fnx/” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” badge_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_link_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”16px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”30px” min_height=”600px” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” animation_style=”fold” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”rgba(83,83,83,0.49)” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22button_bg_color%22,%22button_bg_color%22%93}”]

With a load capacity of 17T, with a maximum operating capacity of 13270 KG. This crane has a four cylinder, water cooled diesel engine with a 60 HP  engine, this crane has  a boom height of 19.2 m with a horizontal reach of 16.6 m. It has a heavy duty transmission for crane application, sliding mesh spur teeth gearbox, 8 forward and 2 reverse speeds with high and low selector and articulated power steering that is hydraulically controlled through two double acting hydraulic rams.

[/dsm_card][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][dsm_card title=”INDO POWER 30 FNX” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/crane7.png” image_as_background=”off” image_alignment=”center” badge_background_color=”#535353″ content_padding=”20px||20px||false|false” button_text=”Know more” button_url=”/equipment/indo-power-30fnx/” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” badge_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_link_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”16px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”30px” min_height=”600px” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” animation_style=”fold” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”rgba(83,83,83,0.49)” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22button_bg_color%22,%22button_bg_color%22%93}”]

This powerful beast has a load capacity of 30T, with a maximum operating capacity of 20060 KG. This crane has a four cylinder, water cooled diesel engine with a 60 HP  engine, this crane has  a boom height of 24.31 m with a horizontal reach of 22 m. It has a heavy duty transmission for crane application, sliding mesh spur teeth gearbox, 8 forward and 2 reverse speeds with high and low selector and articulated power steering that is hydraulically controlled through two double acting hydraulic rams.

excerpt.rendered: Cranes A REPUTABLE & RELIABLE CRANES MANUFACTURING COMPANY Globally, the construction industry is one of the fastest-growing sectors today. We, at Indo Farm, create robust and easy-to-handle hydraulic pick and carry cranes that comply with high standards of strength, safety, and operability to assist you to gain a competitive edge in the market. Built for […]
